arabic_text: يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تَكۡفُرُونَ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَنتُمۡ تَشۡهَدُونَ
translation: O People of the Book, why do you disbelieve in the verses of Allah[29] while you testify [to their truth]?
footnotes: [29] About Prophet Muhammad (ﷺ), while you have it written in your Books but you hide it.
